section_purpose: To present results from an ablation study comparing the performance of UNSAT-core prediction versus SAT/UNSAT prediction as supervision signals, validating the choice of UNSAT-core prediction for the model.
key_points: UNSAT-core prediction as an objective outperforms SAT/UNSAT prediction on the industrial LEC dataset.
The improved performance validates the use of UNSAT-core prediction as the supervision signal in the model.
Results are based on Fig. 4(b) from the experimental results.
dependencies: Section 3: IB-Net approach (neural network model and training)
reproducibility_notes: Choice of supervision signal: UNSAT-core prediction
Performance comparison with SAT/UNSAT prediction objective
